entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:06 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 later in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:06 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:06 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
